description.value: When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Thrash] a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Grabbed] foe, you smack that foe into another nearby. Another foe adjacent to the grabbed foe also takes your Thrash damage, with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.classDCs.barbarian.dc.value)|basic:true] save against your class DC.
